text: This is a list of television programs currently or formerly broadcast by Cartoon Network Arabic in the Middle East. The network was launched on October 10, 2010, and airs mainly animated programming, ranging from action to animated comedy. ==Current programming== Title Premiere date End date Adventure Time present The Amazing World of Gumball Present Ben 10: Omniverse Present DreamWorks Dragons Present Angelo Rules (Season 2) Present Batman: The Animated Series Present The Smurfs: The 2011 Series Present ¡Oswaldo!
